meanings.definition: A town or village in Spanish-speaking regions.
meanings.sent1: The small pueblo had colorful houses.
meanings.sent2: The pueblo was bustling with activity.
meanings.sent3: The pueblo decided to have a big fiesta.
meanings.sent4: In the pueblo of my mind, dreams come true.
meanings.sent5: The pueblo nestled in the valley was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A communal dwelling of certain Native American peoples in the southwestern United States.
meanings.sent1: The ancient pueblo was made of adobe.
meanings.sent2: Visiting the pueblo gave me a sense of history.
meanings.sent3: The pueblo potluck was a delicious affair.
meanings.sent4: Their unity made the pueblo a strong community.
meanings.sent5: The sun setting behind the pueblo was a breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: A group of Native American peoples living in such a dwelling.
meanings.sent1: The pueblo shared stories around the fire.
meanings.sent2: Each pueblo had its own traditions.
meanings.sent3: The pueblo celebrated the harvest together.
meanings.sent5: The laughter echoed through the pueblo.
